[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Add simple and hard ways to produce vanilla resources in late game.
[h1]Natural Wells[/h1] Steam geysers now are Natural Wells. They don't spawn on map anymore; They are created after build a Excavator, trigger him and wait for 3 days; You can build awesome machines in natural wells, like:
[h1]General Content[/h1] [b]Geothermal generator[/b] ([i]For uninterrupted generation of eletricity[/i]) Now in two sizes: 5x5 and 3x3. The costs and production are proportional.
[b]Powered Drill[/b] ([i]For infinite generation of resources[/i]) Require a huge amount of work and eletricity to produce this resources: [i](wood; chemfuel; steel; pasteel; silver; gold; jade; uranium)[/i]; Its done by miners and is faster if linked with a ground penetrating scanner; Rare and precious resources are more difficult to extract.
[b]Steel Extractor[/b] ([i]For automatic generation of steel[/i]) Require 1200w/h to produce 150 steel each two days. Deteriorate after 1 year.
[b]Uranium Power Cell[/b] ([i]For generation of eletricty[/i]) Produce 3000w/h. Consumes 220 uranium per year; Be careful, they are destroyed if stay empty; [i](don't must be placed on natural wells)[/i].
[b]Overpressure Bomb[/b] ([i]For BIG explosions[/i]) This bomb don't trigger with damage (except EMP), only manually by colonists; Causes a big explosion which destroys everything in a large area. When you click on the bomb, you can see the range of the explosion. Walls can protect colonists, but armours and clothes don't prevent the death.
[b]Matrix Chunks and Eletric Stonecutter[/b] The "Matrix Chunk" is added. It's very resistant and can be transformed in other blocks; This chunk only can be founded in natural wells and extracted by powered drills; You need eletric stonecutter workbench to transform him into blocks; Also, this new workbench cuts other chunks 3 times faster than the vanilla stonecutter; [i](don't must be placed on natural wells)[/i].
[h1]Compabilities[/h1] I don't recommend add this on existing saves (but maybe can works); Works fine with other mods but needs patches to add new modded resources to powered drill.
[h1]Balance[/h1] This mod is supposed be difficult, but not impossible to play; [i]Why drills produce wood fro[/i]--NO, DON'T DO THIS; Feel free to suggest value changes on comments.
